statements: SELECT * FROM error_log;
SELECT error_description, correction_attempt_date FROM error_log WHERE correction_success = true;
SELECT error_description FROM error_log WHERE error_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM error_log ORDER BY correction_attempt_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM error_log WHERE error_description LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY error_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM error_log WHERE correction_success = TRUE;
SELECT error_description, correction_attempt_date FROM error_log WHERE error_id > 10 ORDER BY correction_attempt_date DESC;
SELECT error_description, COUNT(*) AS total_errors FROM error_log GROUP BY error_description HAVING total_errors > 5;
SELECT AVG(error_id) AS avg_error_id FROM error_log WHERE correction_success = FALSE;
SELECT error_description, correction_attempt_date FROM error_log WHERE correction_success = TRUE AND error_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY error_id ASC, correction_attempt_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM error_log;
SELECT error_id, error_message, timestamp FROM error_log WHERE correction_attempts > 3;
SELECT correction_message, success FROM correction_log WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT correction_id, correction_message, timestamp FROM correction_log WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM error_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM error_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT error_id, error_message FROM error_log WHERE correction_attempts > 3;
SELECT error_id, error_message, correction_attempts FROM error_log WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT error_message, correction_attempts FROM error_log WHERE error_message LIKE '%database%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_errors FROM error_log;
SELECT * FROM error_logs;
SELECT log_id, error_description FROM error_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, error_description FROM error_logs ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT log_id, error_timestamp FROM error_logs WHERE error_description LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM error_attempts JOIN error_logs ON error_attempts.log_id = error_logs.log_id WHERE error_attempts.error_code = 404;
SELECT * FROM error_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, error_description FROM error_logs WHERE error_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT log_id, error_description, error_timestamp FROM error_logs ORDER BY error_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, error_description, error_timestamp FROM error_logs WHERE error_description LIKE '%database%';

SELECT el.log_id, ec.correction_id, ec.correction_timestamp FROM error_logs AS el INNER JOIN error_attempts AS ea ON el.log_id = ea.log_id INNER JOIN error_corrections AS ec ON ea.attempt_id = ec.attempt_id;
SELECT * FROM failed_error_logs;
SELECT id, error_message FROM successful_correction_logs WHERE id = 3;
SELECT correction_message FROM successful_correction_logs ORDER BY correction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM error_correction_attempts WHERE attempt_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT procedure_name, procedure_description FROM error_correction_procedures WHERE id IN (1, 2);
SELECT * FROM failed_error_logs WHERE error_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT error_message, error_timestamp FROM failed_error_logs WHERE id = 10;
SELECT ec.id, ccp.procedure_name FROM error_correction_attempts ec JOIN error_correction_procedures ccp ON ec.error_id = ccp.id;
SELECT eccp.procedure_name, eccp.procedure_description FROM error_correction_attempts ec JOIN error_correction_procedures eccp ON ec.error_id = eccp.id WHERE ec.attempt_timestamp < '2022-05-01';

SELECT sec.id, sec.correction_message, sep.procedure_description FROM successful_correction_logs sec JOIN error_correction_procedures sep ON sec.id = sep.id WHERE sec.correction_timestamp > '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM FailedErrorLogs;
SELECT error_message, timestamp FROM SuccessfulErrorProcedures ORDER BY correction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, error_code, attempted_correction FROM ErrorLogs WHERE error_code = 404;
SELECT * FROM CorrectionLogs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT correction_method, success_rate FROM CorrectionStatistics ORDER BY success_rate DESC, total_successes DESC;
SELECT * FROM ErrorLogs ORDER BY time_of_occurrence DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT error_message, error_code FROM FailedErrorLogs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY error_code ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_errors, AVG(error_code) AS avg_error_code FROM FailedErrorLogs WHERE error_message LIKE '%error%';
SELECT correction_method, success_rate FROM CorrectionStatistics WHERE total_attempts > 50 ORDER BY success_rate DESC;
SELECT id, error_message, error_code, timestamp FROM FailedErrorLogs WHERE error_message ILIKE '%connection%' AND error_code > 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
